Job Description:

 

Trade/Finance Exp must

  • Process and monitor various trade transactions and perform ancillary follow-up tasks in accordance with established procedures and within agreed service standards
  • Facilitate a smooth client end-to-end experience by being involved in client onboarding, documentation verification, answering clarifications, providing notifications and reports, etc.
  • Closely collaborate with business stakeholders across Commercial and other teams to understand existing and upcoming business needs and provide inputs from an operational perspective
  • Design and document end-to-end transaction process and contribute to policy/process drafting
  • Design and test process and system improvements
  • Design and execute controls to manage operational risk

 

 

Requirements:

  • Exp in KYC, CDD (customer due diligence), document verification
  • Payments experience, sending cross border funds
  • Being a PoC for all operations in India
  • Follow-up with clients and Singapore team on agreed services and operations
  • Governance, Ops policies experience
